metadata.title: Node.js - Complete Documentation
metadata.description: A fully-featured and responsive documentation template built with Next.js, designed to help you create clean, modern, and multilingual docs for any Node.js project.

home.main_header: Easily create beautiful and powerful documentation for your Node.js projects.
home.sub_header: Crafted using Next.js and modern tools, this template provides a fast, responsive, and beginner-friendly platform to document everything your project needs — now in both English and বাংলা!
home.name: Node.js
